aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I'm Felipe Villani, I graduated in Computer Engineering from Instituto Mau√° de Tecnologia. Enthusiastic about video games, sports, and the financial market, I am always looking for challenges that allow me to grow professionally. Driven by a continuous search for knowledge and the practical application of my software development skills, I focus on clean and efficient solutions. In addition, I value teamwork as a means to achieve exceptional results.
aboutMe.csharpExperience: Since the beginning of my professional career, I have predominantly worked with C#, focusing on the development and maintenance of systems and APIs, usually using the MS SQL Server database system.
aboutMe.flutterExperience: I have developed several applications and completed a Flutter course, through which I gained deep knowledge of reactivity, state management, and Clean Architecture.
aboutMe.pythonExperience: During my time in college, Python was the language I used the most, especially for data science and AI. I have a good understanding of the language and key libraries, such as Pandas, NumPy, and SciKit-Learn.
aboutMe.javaScriptExperience: Professionally, I have developed and maintained applications built with Angular. To deepen my knowledge in this field, I took a web development course and worked on several projects.

codeCrafty.title: QRCode Generator
codeCrafty.description: A responsive and visually appealing website that generates static QR codes from user-entered text, enabling quick and easy downloads.

tripPlanner.title: Travel Organizer
tripPlanner.description: A platform that helps you organize your next trip by allowing you to create budgets, providing climate expectations, and highlighting tourist attractions.

aHalfIMDB.title: Movies App
aHalfIMDB.description: A simple mobile application that consumes the IMDB API to display information about popular movies, series, and actors, allowing users to search across these categories.

contact.title: Contact
contact.firstMessage: Do you want to get in touch with me?
contact.secondMessage: Feel free to send me an email!
